price: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun jujjũya, a cikin wannan Alƙur'ãni, daga kõwane irin misãli ga mutãne (dõmin su gãne, su bi sharĩ'a), kuma mutum yã kasance mafi yawan abu ga jidãli.*
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَا فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ لِلنَّاسِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖۚ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَكۡثَرَ شَيۡءٖ جَدَلٗا
footnotes: * Jidãli, shĩ ne jãyayya, alhãli kuwa mutum yã san yanã kan ƙarya.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ṣarrafnā fī hādhā al-qur'āni lilnnāsi min kulli mathalin wakāna al-insānu akthara shayin jadalan
